en.decreeAbsoluteHasBeenGranted: Your decree absolute has been granted
en.emailConfirmation: Email confirmation has been sent to {{ case.petitionerEmail }}.
en.ThisIsTheCertificateConfirming: This is the certificate confirming that you're divorced. Keep your certificate safe. You'll need to take a printed copy to the register office if you want to get married again.
en.yourDivorceWhoWillBeSentAnEmail: Your {{ case.divorceWho }} has been sent an email telling them how to download the decree absolute.
en.yourDocumentsWillBeAvailableFor1Year: Your documents will be available here for one year
en.yourAccountWillThenBeClosed: Your account will then be closed. If you need a certified copy after that, you'll need to apply to the general register office and pay a fee.

cy.decreeAbsoluteHasBeenGranted: Mae eich dyfarniad absoliwt wedi’i ganiatáu
cy.emailConfirmation: Mae neges e-bost yn cadarnhau hyn wedi’i anfon i {{ case.petitionerEmail }}.
cy.ThisIsTheCertificateConfirming: Dyma'r dystysgrif sy’n cadarnhau eich bod wedi ysgaru. Cadwch eich tystysgrif yn ddiogel. Bydd angen ichi fynd â chopi wedi’i argraffu i'r swyddfa gofrestru os byddwch eisiau priodi eto.
cy.yourDivorceWhoWillBeSentAnEmail: Mae eich {{ case.divorceWho }} wedi cael neges e-bost yn rhoi gwybod iddynt sut i lawrlwytho’r dyfarniad absoliwt.
cy.yourDocumentsWillBeAvailableFor1Year: Bydd eich dogfennau ar gael yma am flwyddyn
cy.yourAccountWillThenBeClosed: Yna bydd eich cyfrif yn cael ei gau. Os byddwch angen copi ardystiedig ar ôl hynny, bydd rhaid ichi wneud cais i’r swyddfa gofrestru gyffredinol a thalu ffi.
